title: 1 Bedroom Carpet
posting_body: *** Application and background check (NO application fee) ***No recent evictions or multiple evictions/force outs.
1 bedroom west side ( Detroit Shore way area/ apartment
11 ft X 8.5 ft )  Security Cameras in Common areas, On-Site Building Custodian.
each unit has it own furnace, tenant controls temperature of their apartment
Location: Minutes to Gordon Square, Ohio City, 5 minutes to downtown, minutes from lakefront/beach
Tenant responsible for utilities ( water, gas and electric) the first 2 months water are free
Included:  trash, gas stove, refrigerator, on site coin laundry, ample parking, RTA stop
*** Application and background check (NO application fee) ***No recent evictions or multiple evictions/force outs.
